name: Gstocks
body: ## Install the Extension: 1. [Download **gstocks**](https://github.com/bfred-it/gstocks/archive/master.zip) 2. Visit `chrome://extensions/` in Chrome 3. Enable the **Developer mode** in the upper-right corner 4. Use the "Load unpacked extensionâ€¦" button on the left 5. Select the folder where you downloaded **gstocks** ## Install the bookmarklet: 0. Drag this bookmarklet to your bookmarks bar: gstocks 0. Visit [google.com/finance](//www.google.com/finance) and click on the bookmarklet
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
